snippet: Some archaeologists and historians worry that the next generation to visit the moon might carelessly obliterate the site of one of humanity’s greatest accomplishments.
abstract: Archaeologists and historians are seeking historical protection for the sites of the Apollo lunar landings, fearing that the next generation of visitors to the moon might carelessly obliterate the site of one of humanity's greatest accomplishments.
lead_paragraph: Some archaeologists and historians worry that the next generation to visit the moon might carelessly obliterate the site of one of humanity’s greatest accomplishments.

headline.seo: A Push for Historic Preservation on the Moon
headline.main: To Preserve History on the Moon, Visitors Are Asked to Tread Lightly
headline.print_headline: To Preserve History on the Moon, Visitors Are Asked to Tread Lightly
